column5: I had to go to the Service Canada branch in North Bay today,The lady who was helping me suddenly looks at my OFC shirt reaches out and grabs my sleeve at the OFC logo and without letting go says do you know TJ::unsure:.I had a perfect image of TJ dressed in his TUTU and had an Over Whelming desire to run but she wouldn't let go:o:o.Well yes I have met him a couple of times I say,hoping that this will appease her and it works,she lets go and sits back down:).He went to school with my husband and fishes and hunts with him all the time(image of TJ in a red hunting TUTU immediately enters my head):rofl2:.Just goes to show you can't go anywhere without meeting some one who knows TJ.  vance
Too funny......  Did you get her husbands name? I'm guessing Tookie.
That's happened to me a few times. My automatic response is denial.
LOL my shirts logo is carhart, and no I don`t know him!
Hmm Service Canada... that's odd.. I'm having a hard time thinking of any of my friends that have a job... some of thier wives do I guess.... LOL Its a small small world after all..
It surely is a small world T J.

I know what you mean I was walking thru an underpass and this wino/homeless dude grabs be by my shirt and says"DO yOu knoW T.J."? or "got any change buddy" one or the other he was mumblin and I think a little drool was heading my way so I left quickly.   Art
It is funny.... most of my friends have ended up homeless...
Just think of all the room you will have in a refrigerator box Roy....You will be the envy of the neighborhood.   Art
